崤字的基本解释

崤
xiáo
〔崤山〕山名，在中国河南省。

崤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiáo］
［《廣韻》胡茅切，平肴，匣。］
［《廣韻》胡刀切，平豪，匣。］
(1)山名。详“崤山”。
(2)古代水名。在今河南省西部。

崤字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　崤； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页314第34
【廣韻】胡交切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】何交切，?音肴。山名。【雍錄】二崤山，又名嶔崟山。【元和志】東崤至西崤三十五里，在秦關之東，漢關之西。【杜預曰】在弘農澠池縣西。【括地志】在洛州永寧縣西北二十里，卽古之崤道。【沈約·應詔詩】推穀二崤道。【公羊傳·僖三十三年】崤之嶔巖，文王所避風雨也。　又通作殽。【春秋·僖三十三年】晉人及姜戎敗秦師于殽。　又省作肴。【後漢·王莽傅】肴黽之險。　又水名。【水經注】崤水出河南盤崤山，西北流。上有梁，歷㵎水，東北流，與石崤水合。

考證：〔【公羊傳·僖三十三年】崤之嶔巖，文王所避風雨處。〕　謹照原文處改也。〔【左傳僖三十三年】晉人及羌戎敗秦師于殽。〕　謹照原書左傳改春秋。羌改姜。

崤字的起名意思

崤山，也叫"崤陵"。在河南省。

["Guangyun" Hu Mao cut, flat dish, box. ]

[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　崤; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 314 Page 34
[Guang Yun] Hu Jiaoqie [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] What cross-cut, sound delicacy. Mountain name. [Yonglu] Erlai Mountain, also known as Rongyan Mountain. [Yuanhezhi] Thirty-five miles from Dongxiao to Xixiao, east of Qin Pass and west of Han Pass. 【Du Yuyue】In the west of Mianchi County, Hongnong. 【Including Topography】Twenty miles northwest of Yongning County, Luozhou, Guzhixiao Road. 【Shen Yue·Yingzhao Poems】Tuigu Erxiao Road. [The Thirty-three Years of Gongyang Biography] Laozhi Yanyan was a shelter from the wind and rain for the King of Wen.　It's confusing again. [Chunqiu·Xi Thirty Years] Jin and Jiang Rong defeated Qin Shiyu.　Save food. [Later Han·Wang Mang Fu] The danger of food strider.　Also known as water. [Shui Jing's Note] Weishui flows out of Panxiao Mountain in Henan and flows to the northwest. There are beams on it, the water flows from the northeast, and it is hydrated with Shiqiao.
